adviseScripts.text: C-Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: What do I need to do... to not be n-nervous in front of people?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Imagine that the people are Raptures.
Be aware of your own cuteness.
But th-then I would want to kill all of them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Still... it is better than shaking in nervousness.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: C-cute? Me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I'm not sure if you are making fun of me...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: But... Thank you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I spend a happy and warm counseling time with Vesti.
E-Emma keeps trying to give me unappetizing food.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: How should I decline?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Blame it on a diet.
Make Emma taste her own food.
B-but...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Then I can't let Emma see me eat anything unhealthy at all.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: S-still, thanks for the advice.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I-I will try that today!
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I should have thought of that before...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I have a meaningful counseling time with Vesti.
Commander, I....
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I keep having n-nightmares these days.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: It's a dream about a murderer coming to the school... and no one survives.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: H-how can I make it stop?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Kill the murderer.
Close your eyes for 3 seconds, then open them again.
Uh... But...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: What if... the murderer... is me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Okay. If I do that, then I can s-stop killing all the students?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: ... Thank you. It was a good idea to consult you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I have a meaningful counseling time with Vesti.
Hey... um...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Do you have an i-ideal type?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Someone small and cute.
Someone tall and mature.
R-really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Oh my. Then I h-have a chance...!
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Hm... As I thought.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: You like mature women, like Emma...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I have a meaningful counseling time with Vesti.
I am trying to keep a diary these days.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: But, I'm worried, because my writing is so ugly...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: It might be prettier than you think. Let me see it.
In the modern, digital age, handwriting isn't important at all.
R-really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Th-then I will bring it next time!
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: ... Don't read it, just look at the writing. Pinky-swear that you promise not to read it...!
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: H-huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: That's... a kind of complicated answer...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: A-anyway, thanks. ... You are trying to comfort me, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I listen to Vesti's small problems.
... I'm worried because I cry too easily.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I cry when I watch something scary, or something gloomy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: When I hear something even a little b-bad, my tears start coming out...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: H-how can I fix this?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: There is no need to fix it. It's a natural thing.
Think about something happy.
Uh... O-okay.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Huh...? Why am I tearing up again...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: May because I've never heard that from anyone else.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: But...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: When I get so worked up, it's hard to think about anything else.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I listen to Vesti's troubles for a while.
B-by any chance.....
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Do you have your own way of relieving stress?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I play games.
I go out and be social.
I-I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I don't think that will work for me. I'm not good at gaming...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: D-does that really relieve stress?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: It does the opposite for me...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Of course, y-you are different, though.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I listen to Vesti's small problems.
Vesti looks upset.
Do you have any complaints?
I am sorry I haven't been able to spend time with you these days.
N-no!
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: How could I possibly have any c-complaints for you...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: N-no!
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I know very well already.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: You have a lot of Nikkes to look after besides me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I comfort Vesti for a while longer.
... If you had someone you hate so much that you wanted to destroy them, what would you do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Find the right moment to strike.
Ignore it and think about something else.
H-huh?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Are you telling me not to put up with it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: ... I-I know I should do that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: But soon after, I will imagine killing them again.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Even though no matter how much I kill them, what they did to me won't change.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I listen to Vesti's troubles for a while.
I want to have a counseling session with you every day.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Do you have a lot of worries recently?
I enjoy having counseling time with you, too.
Y-yes...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: That's true too, but...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I just like spending time with you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: R-really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Wh-wh-what should I do? I'm so happy right now!
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I spend a happy and warm counseling time with Vesti.
Commander...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: is there anything you only do with people that you're close to?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Being at ease while I talk with them, like right now.
Talking with them on Bla every single day.
So, would you consider us to be close?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: More than that.... do you feel comfortable around me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I'm so happy to hear that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Oh... um... in that case...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Can I send you a message every day from now on?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Vesti and I have a lovely discussion.
... Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: What's your favorite movie genre?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Horror movies that make you jump out of your seat.
Animated movies with cute characters.
H-how can you watch something like that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Going to watch a movie like that seems like a waste of money...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: You have a soft spot for cute and cuddly creatures as well?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: That makes two of us!
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Great minds think alike, hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I spend time with Vesti talking about movies we want to watch.
Commander...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: have you ever had a crush on someone?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Yes, I have.
No, I haven't.
What? You have?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I see...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Y-you don't have to say anymore...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: You've never been in love with someone before?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I'm glad... So glad...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Vesti and I have a nice heart-to-heart.
Can I ask you something?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: What do you do when you are overwhelmed with loneliness?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I write in my journal to try and give words to my feelings.
I enjoy that feeling and revel in it.
So you like writing in your journal as well?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I think it's a wonderful thing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: It helps keep the loneliness at bay...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: ... You're strange, Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Who would enjoy feeling that way?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I spend time with Vesti talking about loneliness.
Commander, when you and I have our discussions,
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: what are you thinking about?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: About you.
Not much.
W-what's going on?! I can feel my face burning up.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: To be honest, your answer makes me a little sad...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Vesti and I have a lovely discussion.
Do you make any resolutions for the new year?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: To forge a greater bond with you.
Not really.
W-with me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Hehe. You and I are already so close...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: If we got any closer then it'd be...l-love?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Oh...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I thought you would have set some goals for yourself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: That's too bad you don't have one...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Vesti about our goals for this year.
Decorating your diary is all the rage right now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: What do you think about people decorating their diaries?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I think it's cute.
The two of us can do it together.
That's great!
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I'm glad that you feel that way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I guess I made the right choice in following the trend.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: You and me? Together?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I'm not sure that's a good idea... We'd have to show each other our diaries.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Vesti about diaries.
Commander, if someone hurt your feelings, how would you respond?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Is there a way to keep your feelings from being hurt?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Whatever they did to me, I'd do the same thing right back at them.
I wouldn't let it get me down and just move on.
But then you're no better than they are!
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I don't think that's right...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I wouldn't feel good about it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: That's probably the best way to go about it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I'll try my best from now on not to let these things get to me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Thank you, Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I gave Vesti more advice on how to let insults roll off your back.
What do you do when you really want to possess someone?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: There this person... and I want them all for myself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: The more you obsess about someone, the more you'll just drive them away.
And who is this person?
Right... if I overstep any boundaries, they might end up leaving...
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I can't have that happen.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I'll just try and hide my true feelings when I'm around them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: ... I-I can't tell you that right now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: So don't bother asking me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I advised Vesti on how to avoid driving away from the object of her affection.
Commander, of all the Nikkes in Absolute,
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: who do you like the most? Who are you most comfortable being around?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: You're my favorite, and I'm most comfortable around you.
I don't know... Emma?
R-really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: You aren't just saying that because I'm here?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I feel the same way about you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Huh? Emma?
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: I have to admit... I'm a little jealous.
adviseScripts.speaker: Vesti

adviseScripts.text: Vesti and I have a nice heart-to-heart.
